pageTextData.x3dCreationMethod: using Blender, Using multiple materials, switchable texture, smoothing and detailed complex modelling & UV Mapping, along with transparency which is adjustable and colour changing.
pageTextData.modelDescription: Immerse yourself in the beauty of sustainable design with our featured exhibit: a mesmerizing plastic drink bottle, ingeniously crafted with eco-friendly materials, showcasing the harmonious blend of aesthetics and environmental consciousness.
